snippet.title: CloverPit - New Gameplay & Demo Trailer | The Triple-i Initiative
snippet.description:
Learn more about CloverPit: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3314790/CloverPit/

We're excited to announce CloverPit. The demonic lovechild of Balatro and Buckshot Roulette, this rogue-lite traps you in a hell of your own creation.

Locked in a rusty cell with a slot machine and an ATM, players must pay off their debt at the end of each round, or fall to ruin – literally. Manipulate the slot machine to earn extra coins. Turn the odds in your favor with various prizes, charms and combos, snowballing into a dazzling lucky run.Bend the rules, break the game, and pay off your captor long enough to earn a shot at freedom. CloverPit will release on PC via Steam later this year, and you can try the first demo of the game right now!

Follow news and updates on The Triple-i Initiative:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/sale/triple-i-initiative 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/iii_initiative 
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@iii_initiative 
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/iii_initiative 
Bilibili: https://space.bilibili.com/3546638813497663
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/iii_initiative 
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@the.iii_initiative 

What is the triple-i initiative?

The Triple-i Initiative is a bunch of studios banding together to share exciting news to our players, in a short show packed with back-to-back trailers. That’s it - no extra fluff, no ads, no host, just games. We’re talking world premieres, exclusive gameplay, launch dates, demo drops and more!

You can learn more over on https://iii-initiative.com
